content.title: Uttar Pradesh Old Age Pension Scheme
content.details: The Uttar Pradesh Old Age Pension Scheme provides financial assistance to senior citizens from economically weaker sections through monthly pension payments.
eligibility: Applicant should be below poverty line or his/her annual income should be upto for Rural Areas Rs. 46,080/- and Urban Areas Rs. 56,460/-.
exclusions: Not eligible if the applicant is benefited from other pension schemes.
content.application_process: Applicants need to visit the official website, select the option 'Old Age Pension', choose 'Apply Online', fill out the form, upload required documents (Photograph and Age certificate), and submit.

faqs.question: What is UP Old age pension Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Government of Uttar Pradesh has introduced an old-age pension scheme for the benefit of the senior citizens in the state. Under this scheme, eligible senior citizens will be provided with financial assistance in the form of a monthly pension.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility?
faqs.answer: Applicant's age should be between 60 to 150. Applicant should be below the poverty line or his/her annual income should be upto for Rural Areas Rs. 46,080/- and for Urban Areas Rs. 56,460/-.

faqs.question: What is the process to apply online?
faqs.answer: Applicants need to visit the official website, select the option 'Old Age Pension', choose 'Apply Online', fill out the form, upload required documents (Photograph and Age certificate), and submit.
